first NFT market explorer on Kusama and: eerste NFT markt verkenner op Kusama en Polkadot
Name you want to show in gallery view: Naam die je wil tonen in de galerijweergave
Symbol you want to trade it under: Symbool waaronder je het wil verhandelen
Describe your collection, it will show u: Beschrijf jouw collectie, dit zal weergegeven worden onder de collectieweergave
Add collection cover which will show up: Voeg collectie cover toe die getoond zal worden in collectieweergave
Select collection where do you want mint: Selecteer collectie waarnaar je jouw token wil minten
Name: Naam

q.1: What coin is used for NFTs?
q.2: What wallet do I need to mint, buy and collect?
q.4: How I can trade KSM for my artwork?

q.15: How I can create own shop?

1.m: @.md:faq.a.1.l1 You can get it through our @.md:faq.a.1.l2 feature or @.md:faq.a.1.l3

2.m: We reccommend you to use @.md:faq.a.2.l1 for now. Later we plan to add mobile-first experience. In all cases, backup your seed, it's your owners right and sort of value.

3.m: You will go to the @.md:faq.a.3.l1 You need to first mint your Collection and then Token. If you want to video that, DM us! The current minimum fee for minting a NFT on KodaDot is around @.common:data.ksm.fee KSM.

4.m: Its supported widely on popular exchanges. At time of writing this FAQ, 2nd February, daily liqudity on exchanges is around $200M at time of writing and 1 $KSM is traded for ~ $100. @.md:faq.a.4.l1

5.m: We have integration with @.md:faq.a.5.l1, click on @.md:faq.a.1.l2 in navbar. You can use Revolut, Manual bank transfer, Debit Card and Apple Pay to top-up your KSM address. You can @.md:faq.a.5.l2

6.m: For best rates, you can @.md:faq.a.6.l1 For best experience @.md:faq.a.6.l2 If you are @.md:faq.a.6.l3

7.m: First of all, you need to install @.md:faq.a.2.l1, backup your seed. Then you top up your wallet address through our @.md:faq.a.1.l2 feature. Once you have funds, head to @.md:faq.a.3.l1, create Collection. Wait till Collection is minted, then you go to @.md:faq.a.7.l1 and Mint your very first token! If you had issues, we are working on our UX-flow. KodaDot has around month old code and there is still room to improve, bear with us, we are just team of two. Happy Minting ðŸ˜Œ

8.m: We are exploring possibilities, we actually plan to actively research on this in our milestone 2

9.m: We are trying delivering incremental updates on daily basis & fixes ASAP. We may published new version and your browser has cached old one. If you are on Windows, try hold down Ctrl and then press F5. Mac users, hold down CMD and Shift and then press R. If this did not help, DMs on Twitter with screenshot where is developer console open.

10.m: SEND will send it to someone, CONSUME will burn it, LIST will list it for sale so someone can buy it from you.

11.m: Best way is to check through @.md:faq.a.11.l1 and lookup your address. @.md:faq.a.11.l2
11.l2: [You can find example how minted NFT looks through explorer, when you look on extrinsics.](@.common:links.kusama_scanner.extrinsic.href)

12.m: Right now, we are aware that US is not supported, other all countries should work, @.md:faq.a.12.l1 This is out of our control right now.

13.m: Right now, you will use LIST in Actions.

14.m: Right now, we don't have chain logic, but we plan to implement something great, soon. @.md:faq.a.14.l1

15.m: We are implementing collection view, sets of collection view. @.md:faq.a.14.l1

16.m: It's that heart ðŸ–¤ under NFT token. We are @.md:faq.a.16.l1 which works like appreciations. It's function is price discovery for your work.

17.m: Right now, we have @.md:faq.a.17.l1 We are actively looking for funding options, eventually we would raise private funds. DMs us, if you are interested into private sale.

18.m: We have only private channel for NFT creators, DM us if you are NFT creator!

19.m: Yes, that's part of our Milestone 2, stay tuned!

20.m: If you are on Mac, on Chrome hit Option, CMD, J, Firefox Command + Option + K.

21.m: Go to @.md:faq.a.21.l1 and see there button Update metadata, then refresh your window, should be working with recent chain types

22.m: Check if you have transferable $KSM on your account, not staked. That's different. You can check it at @.md:faq.a.22.l1 and at balances unfold, you can see there Transferable amount.

Instance_tooltip: Instance is like the identifier of an NFT, like a marketplace ticker. It's a "short computer-friendly name"
Upload will upload your image of the NFT: Uploaden zal je de foto van jouw NFT uploaden
Click to add image: Druk om afbeelding weer te geven
Gallery of NFT Tokens and Collectibles: Galerij van NFT tokens en verzamelingen
Nieuw hier? Bekijk de meest gestelde vragen.
Feedback? We zouden het graag willen bespreken.
Lees hoe ons verhaal begonnen is.
FAQQ1: What coin is used for NFTs?
FAQA1: Kusama, $KSM. You can get it through our Credit feature or through custodial exchange.
FAQQ2: What wallet do I need to mint, buy and collect?
FAQA2: We recommend you to use Polkadot Extension for now. Later we plan to add mobile-first experience. In all cases, backup your seed, it\s your owners right and sort of value.
FAQA3: You will go to the Create. You need to first mint your Collection and then Token. If you want to video that, DM us!
FAQQ4: How I can trade KSM for my artwork?
FAQA4: Its supported widely on popular exchanges. At time of writing this FAQ, 2nd February, daily liqudity on exchanges is around $200M at time of writing and 1 $KSM is traded for ~ $100. Check for recent price at Coingecko
FAQQ5: How I can buy KSM as new-comer?
FAQA5: We have integration with Ramp.network, click on Credit in navbar. You can use Revolut, Manual bank transfer, Debit Card and Apple Pay to top-up your KSM address. You can buy $KSM at Binance
FAQQ6: How I can buy KSM with ETH, DAI, BTC..?
FAQA6: For best rates, you can use custodial exchange from list. For best experience we recommend you to use Binance. If you are looking for simple trade, try SimpleSwap.
FAQQ7: What's the flow when I'm NFT creator?
FAQA7: First of all, you need to install Polkadot Extension, backup your seed. Then you top up your wallet address through our Credit feature. Once you have funds, head to Create, create Collection. Wait till Collection is minted, then you go to Create Token and Mint your very first token! If you had issues, we are working on our UX-flow. KodaDot has around month old code and there is still room to improve, bear with us, we are just team of two. Happy Minting ðŸ˜Œ
FAQQ8: Can I use this in virtual worlds?
FAQA8: We are exploring possibilities, we actually plan to actively research on this in our milestone 2
FAQQ9: I've got errors, how to resolve them?
FAQA9: We are trying delivering incremental updates on daily basis & fixes ASAP. We may published new version and your browser has cached old one. If you are on Windows, try hold down Ctrl and then press F5. Mac users, hold down CMD and Shift and then press R. If this did not help, DMs on Twitter with screenshot where is developer console open.
FAQQ10: What does SEND, CONSUME, LIST mean?
FAQA10: SEND will send it to someone, CONSUME will burn it, LIST will list it for sale so someone can buy it from you.
FAQQ11: I've minted NFT, but I don't see it in gallery, where is it?
FAQA11: Best way is to check through Subscan Explorer and lookup your address. You can find example how minted NFT looks through explorer, when you look on extrinsics.
FAQA12: Right now, we are aware that US is not supported, other all countries should work, full list of supported countries. This is out of our control right now.
FAQQ13: How I will sell my token?
FAQA13: Right now, you will use LIST in Actions.
FAQA14: Right now, we don't have chain logic, but we plan to implement something great, soon. Stay with us and follow us @KodaDot!
FAQQ15: How I can create own shop?
FAQA15: We are implementing collection view, sets of collection view. Stay with us and follow us @KodaDot!
FAQA16: It's that heart ðŸ–¤ under NFT token. We are origin authors of EMOTE in RMRK standard which works like appreciations. It's function is price discovery for your work.
FAQA17: Right now, we have Kusama Treasury funding for Milestone 1. We are actively looking for funding options, eventually we would raise private funds. DMs us, if you are interested into private sale.
FAQA18: We have only private channel for NFT creators, DM us if you are NFT creator!
FAQQ19: Will you have AR/VR mode or implementation?
FAQA19: Yes, that's part of our Milestone 2, stay tuned!
FAQA20: If you are on Mac, on Chrome hit Option, CMD, J, Firefox Command + Option + K.
FAQQ21: How do I update metadata for extension?
FAQA21: Go to Dotapps.io, Settings > Metadata and see there button Update metadata, then refresh your window, should be working with recent chain types
FAQA22: Check if you have transferable $KSM on your account, not staked. That's different. You can check it at Dotapps.io > Accounts and at balances unfold, you can see there Transferable amount.
